comments:
20020124, GTK, Red Hat Linux 7.1

The following happens occasionally upon startup -- not consistently
reproducible, but when it does, Eclipse hangs with the splash screen.

Console output:

$ eclipse
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable
(java.lang.NullPointerException)

org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoader.java:878)

This problem is really old. I have not seem it happen in newer builds. I will close
it. If it still happens for you, please reopen.
